import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faChevronRight,faChevronLeft}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import'../styles/StatsBox.css';// Mock data - would come from API in real app

StatsBox=()=>{const[currentStat,setCurrentStat]=useState(0);const nextStat=()=>{setCurrentStat(prev=>prev===statsItems.length-1?0:prev+1);};const details ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faChevronRight})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"stat-control ${index===currentStat?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>setCurrentStat(index),"aria-label":`Go to stat ${index+1}`},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"stat-control next",onClick:nextStat,"aria-label":"Next stat",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faChevronRight})})]})]})]});};export default StatsBox;
